Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Harlem (O'Hare Branch). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Harlem (O'Hare Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
